short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-collects channel points on Twitch, and auto-plays when errors popup and interrupt the video.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help your Twitch experience.

It will collect channel points automatically, without you having to click on the prompt every few minutes.

And, if you are prone to getting errors that interrupt the video (error #1000, #2000, etc.), this extension will click the large play button automatically, so your interruption is minimal.
